resources.string: Not knowing it was impossible, he went there and did it.
You are not defeated when you lose, you are defeated when you give up!
When it\'s dark, we see more stars!
Insanity is always doing the same thing and expecting a different result.
Don\'t stop when you\'re tired, stop when you\'re done.
What can you do now that has the greatest impact on your success?
The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
You lose all chances that you don\'t take advantage of.
Failure is the condiment that gives flavor to success.
As long as we are not committed, there will be hesitation!
If you don\'t know where you want to go, any path will do.
If you believe, it makes all the difference.
Risks must be taken, because the greatest danger is not to risk anything!
